title: The Sound of Music logo
content:
Hi all,

I am looking for some information about the typeface used in this logo. WhatTheFont wasn't useful.

Thanks a lot.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331000744im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Schermafbeelding-2014-09-22-om-11_3720.51.jpg)

Font: 

 Lighthouse 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331000744/http:/www.typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: flitsor

comments.content:
Lighthouse by Mans Greback/Aring Typeface comes awfully close (maybe they substituted a capital S for the more cursive lowercase s?):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/lighthouse/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331000744/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/lighthouse/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/lighthouse/")

Though not an exact match by any means, Lobster Script (a free Google font), approximates the look:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Lobster](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331000744/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Lobster "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Lobster")
